properties.name: PROMPT_CONFIGURATION_PATH
properties.description: Path to a custom JSON file which contains the classes and associated prompts that will be sent to LLaVA.

actions.name: LLAVA DETECTION (256 FRAME INTERVAL) ACTION
actions.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for each video frame passed in.

actions.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for each video frame passed in.

actions.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for the class of the feed forward detection passed in.
